channel.title: Error on LPP
channel.description: Recent content in Error on LPP

item.title: python/IndentationError - expected an indented block
item.description: vscode에서 Python: Run Selection/Line in Python Terminal 실행시에 python/IndentationError: expected an indented block 에러가 발생하면 Enable REPLSmart Send 설정을 확인해서 활성화 해야 한다.
